data.name: Mod_BackwardСompatibilityMessage
data.value: Les données du Node Controller originel ont été importées. La rétrocompatibilité n'assure pas le transfert de toutes les données, il est peut être nécessaire de faire des ajustements manuels.

data.name: Mod_BackwardСompatibilityWarning
data.value: AVERTISSEMENT : Si vous faites une nouvelle sauvegarde, vous ne pourrez plus utiliser le Node Controller originel sur cette carte.

data.name: Mod_Description
data.value: Changer le type de nœud et la forme

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0_1
data.value: - Added auto mode for main slope direction. - Added red overlay for short segments (short segments lead wrong vehicle speed). - Added the ability reset only offset to default. - Added Polish translation. - Fix default node shape calculation. - Fix wrong corner calculation on too sloped or too curved segments. - Fix broken nodes after reload map without close game. - Fix vehicle trailers disappear. - Fix road disappear after disasters. - Fix wrong train twist direction. - Fix node height in asset editor. - Fix default offset value. - Fix compatibility with TMPE. - Fix load data from intersection assets. - Fix not deletable pilars after place intersection asset.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0_2
data.value: - Fix node height outside available tiles (5x5). - Fix node center position. - Fix crosswalk texture. - Fix creating button duplicates - Fix despaired "Make end straight" button.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0_4
data.value: - Added missing dependencies and mod conflict checker. - Removed segments collision between train/metro tracks. - Fix loading offset if value more then 100m. - Fix segment direction correction on shifted segment. - Fix not main segment calculation on sloped node. - Fix crossing and uturn node type. - Added Italian translation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0_5
data.value: - Fix segments collision calculation. - Added Chinese Traditional translation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_1
data.value: - Added underground mode (hold Shift to select underground node). - Added nearby nodes overlay. - Added calculate shift by nearby nodes - set average shift value to node. - Added calculate shift by intersections - set shift value for all nodes between intersection for smooth transition (like -2,-1,0,+1,+2). - Added set shift between intersections - set this shift value for all nodes between intersection. - Added shortcuts, you can bind keys in mod's options. - Added the ability to hide marking and change rotation on untouchable (like harbor or cargo station) segments. - Fixed resetting node style middle nodes after load map. - Fixed resetting node style when replace segment. - Fixed auto main slope direction calculation.
